full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA RTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG DGUGS BYA TSUL RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG DGUGS @011B BYA TSUL RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,JA HA CHEN GUNG THOGS THU PA THUS DNGUL GYI MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS, ,'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I DON BU 'DOD PA NI BU THOB GYUR ZHING, ,ZHES PA GZHUNG YOD PA'I PHYIR AE LO KOG SAN HU THUG THU MER GEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AER TI NI NOM CHI THO'ING KU SHRI SLOB DPON BLO BZANG RGYAL MCHOG'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR BA ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
